ing: 1/2 (750 milliliter) bottle red wine (such as Red CatÂ®)
1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen concentrated fruit punch
des: "Another great way to enjoy a glass of red wine. I had this once at a state fair and was hooked. So yummy on a hot summer day!"
ins: Place ice in a blender; add red wine, fruit punch, and confectioners' sugar. Blend mixture until ice is evenly chopped and mixture is slushie-consistency, adding more ice if desired.
